new WebCLGL(webglcontext)

Class for parallelization of calculations using the WebGL context similarly to webcl

createBuffer(type, linear, mode) → {WebCLGLBuffer}

Create a empty WebCLGLBuffer

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
type String <optional>
 "FLOAT"

type FLOAT4 OR FLOAT
linear boolean <optional>
 false

linear texParameteri type for the WebGLTexture
mode String <optional>
 "SAMPLER"

Mode for this buffer. "SAMPLER", "ATTRIBUTE", "VERTEX_INDEX"

Perform WebGL graphical representation

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
webCLGLVertexFragmentProgram WebCLGLVertexFragmentProgram
bufferInd WebCLGLBuffer

Buffer to draw type (type indices or vertex)
drawMode int <optional>
 4

0=POINTS, 3=LINE_STRIP, 2=LINE_LOOP, 1=LINES, 5=TRIANGLE_STRIP, 6=TRIANGLE_FAN and 4=TRIANGLES

 null
